entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Clearing this morning. Fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:16 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 06:16 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
